My website is a shifting house ...

Republication and Circulation of my essay
2018 – present
Press

My essay "My Website Is a Shifting House..." about personal websites has been republished in multiple venues:

  • How do you use the internet mindfully?, The Creative Independent and Are.na, 2018
  • Mediabus 5 (Korean translation), 2019
  • Are.na Annual, 2020
  • Nevoazul 4 (Portuguese translation), 2023
